reuters.title: U.S. EXPORT INSPECTIONS, IN THOUS BUSHELS, SOYBEANS 8,392 WHEAT 33,641 CORN 33,728
reuters.body: The American Stock Exchange said 4,250,000 shares of Uno Restaurant Corp, holding company for a chain of 37 pizza restaurants, began trading under the symbol "UNO." The West Roxbury, Mass.-based company previously traded in the NASDAQ National System under the symbol "UNOS." Reuter 
